;http://www.pageonein24hours.com/2011/09/03/how-do-i-get-on-google/;
;
;Useful is the new cool. Provide useful information to your readers and you will attract more people to your website. Label that information with keywords people are using to search for your type of stuff and they will find you. And for God's sake, don't bore me.

;http://www.google-seo-tools.com;
;
;There are quite a few Google SEO Tools, so choosing the best ones can be a difficult task. If you are not sure which to go with, here are 3 of the better tools out there.
